COMMON.PLACEHOLDER: Type / to open the commands menu

OPTIONS.TOOLTIP_TITLE: Drag or click to open options for this block

ACTIONS.COMMAND: key to open the command in the field selection
ACTIONS.ENTER: key to add a new field, or,
ACTIONS.CTRL_I: key to open the insert field menu
ACTIONS.ESC: key to close spotlight, field selector, and field options
ACTIONS.BACKSPACE: key twice when the field is empty to remove the field
ACTIONS.UP: arrow key to move up into different fields, and,
ACTIONS.CTRL_UP: arrow key to drag the field upwards
ACTIONS.DOWN: arrow key to move down into different fields, and,
ACTIONS.CTRL_DOWN: arrow key to drag the field downwards
ACTIONS.CTRL_K: key to open the builder spotlight
ACTIONS.CTRL_D: key to duplicate the focused field
ACTIONS.CTRL_DELETE: key to remove the focused field

SPOTLIGHT.PLACEHOLDER: What field would you like to add?

TIPS.1: Move your arrow keys (â†•), and press Enter to see the magic.
TIPS.2: Press Esc to close the builder spotlight.
